hanzi-su-wiki:
伝

Значения

Сообщать, передавать; оставлять; проводить (тепло); летопись, предание; биография, жизнеописание

Мнемоника

  • Сокращение. Передавать в доверительном разговоре 云 надёжному человеку 亻 секреты мастерства, знания.

  • "Два 二 человека передали сообщение."

Варианты

傳, 传
purpleculture_pinyin:
chuán
Japanese variant of 传
Японский вариант 传

yún
to summon; to propagate; to transmit
призывать; размножать; передавать
rtega_mnemonic:
傳傳RS
传传		伝summon, propagate, transmit
  • person 亻 concentrating 專/专 on something (transmits and propagates ideas) or someone (he needs him, thus he summons him)
  • people 亻 transmit ideas and traditions by talking 云 to each other while walking along each other
heisig_constituent: transmit, person, rising cloud, two, elbow, wall
heisig_story: Person . . . rising cloud. Hint: the Amerindians' smoke signal scan help provide a good image for this kanji, whose key word is meant to include transmissions of all sorts.
Keyword_KANJIDIC: transmit, go along, walk along, follow, report, communicate, legend, tradition
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: передачи, идти вперед, идти вдоль, следить, отчет, общаться, легенды, традиции
koohiiStory1: Mister T transmits a message with rising clouds (smoke) signals, to a nearby American Indian tribe. The smoke signals spell : "I p-i-t-y y-o-u f-o-o !".
koohiiStory2: Hanging one-handed under Cloud City, the Jedi-in-training Luke, uses the force to transmit his distress to Leia.
kunYomi: つた.わる、つた.える、つた.う、つだ.う、-づた.い、つて
jp_example_words:
言伝(ことづて): declaration, hearsay
伝言(つてごと): verbal message, rumor, word
伝説(でんせつ): tradition, legend, folklore
伝達(でんたつ): transmission (e.g. news), communication, delivery
伝来(でんらい): ancestral, hereditary, imported, transmitted, handed down
お手伝いさん(おてつだいさん): maid
宣伝(せんでん): propaganda, publicity
伝わる(つたわる): be handed down, be introduced, be transmitted, be circulated, go along, walk along
手伝い(てつだい): help, helper, assistant
伝記(でんき): biography, life story
伝染(でんせん): contagion
伝統(でんとう): tradition, convention
伝える(つたえる): tell, report
手伝う(てつだう): help
jp_readingExamples: 伝う (つた.う), 伝える (つた.える), 伝わる (つた.わる)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The leader has a cloud that he uses to transmit all of the messages he needs to send to his people. The cloud floats above him and when he wants to tell people something he just whispers into the cloud and it transmits his message really, really loudly to all of them.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture this special cloud floating above your leader. It's probably just a speaker attached to a drone covered in cotton balls.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: As the leader transmits his latest series of messages to you and the others, you notice a pretty large dent (でん) in it. That dent is probably a clue to what this cloud is really made of.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: You highly doubt this is a magical cloud that can transmit messages. You inch closer to the big dent and try to poke it. Your finger goes right in! Hmm, you're still pretty sure there's a trick to this thing.
Ru_Meaning: transmit, go along, walk along, follow, report, communicate, legend, tradition
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the man (亻) says (云) = to tell

伝字的基本解释

伝
yún
〔伝伝〕行走、飘移不停的样子。如“魂犹伝伝也，行不休于外也。”

[①]［yún］
见“伝伝”。

伝
Basic explanation of words
伝
yún
〔伝伝〕Walking and drifting constantly. For example, "The soul is still dignified, and you can never stop doing it outside."

яп. вм. 传

伝

Значения

Сообщать, передавать; оставлять; проводить (тепло); летопись, предание; биография, жизнеописание

Мнемоника

  • Сокращение. Передавать в доверительном разговоре 云 надёжному человеку 亻 секреты мастерства, знания.

  • "Два 二 человека передали сообщение."

Варианты

傳, 传

Radicals: ｲ, 云  (leader, cloud)
Meaning Mnemonic
The leader has a cloud that he uses to transmit all of the messages he needs to send to his people. The cloud floats above him and when he wants to tell people something he just whispers into the cloud and it transmits his message really, really loudly to all of them.
Picture this special cloud floating above your leader. It's probably just a speaker attached to a drone covered in cotton balls.
Reading Mnemonic
As the leader transmits his latest series of messages to you and the others, you notice a pretty large dent (でん) in it. That dent is probably a clue to what this cloud is really made of.
You highly doubt this is a magical cloud that can transmit messages. You inch closer to the big dent and try to poke it. Your finger goes right in! Hmm, you're still pretty sure there's a trick to this thing.
